function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Shortage of medical resources, especially doctors and nurses, leading to lack of timely diagnosis and treatment for COVID-19 infectors.","Impact":"Increased spread of COVID-19 and higher risk of severe outcomes for infected individuals.","Mitigation":"Increase and redistribute medical resources to affected areas, train additional medical personnel, and implement telemedicine services.","Technologies":"Telemedicine platforms, remote monitoring devices, 5G-enabled healthcare networks.","People":"Infected individuals, healthcare workers, general public in affected areas.","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government health departments, technology providers."}]}
